## encodingExists() function

Tests whether an encoding exists and is supported.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function encodingExists(encoding: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  encoding | <code>string</code> | The IANA character set name of the encoding. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
